tool_description: API for Compliance & AML Solutions.  Search by PEP, Sanctions, +5000 public lists.
name: Sanctions and PEP Screening
title: Sanctions and PEP Screening

api_list.name: Authentication
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sanctions-and-pep-screening.p.rapidapi.com/api/auth/authenticate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sanctions-and-pep-screening.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
